meanings.definition: One who recounts events or stories.
meanings.sent1: The recounter shared a tale of adventure with the children.
meanings.sent2: The historian was a skilled recounter of ancient legends.
meanings.sent3: The recounter made the story so funny that everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a recounter, always ready to retell the past.
meanings.sent5: The old man was a master recounter, painting vivid pictures with his words.

meanings.definition: To tell or narrate a story or events.
meanings.sent1: She will recounter the thrilling adventure to her friends.
meanings.sent2: He recounters the tale of the lost city with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The children asked her to recounter the story again and again.
meanings.sent4: His voice recounters the past like a melody from another time.
meanings.sent5: The bard recounters the epic saga with passion and flair.
